recommendations.recommendation: The system is working but has room for improvement. Focus on fixing the most common error patterns.

recommendations.issue: Too many products misclassified as "Unknown - Unable to Classify" (9 errors)
recommendations.recommendation: The "Unknown - Unable to Classify" pattern may be too broad or need more specific keywords. Review the keywords and add negative keywords to exclude false matches.
Add more product type patterns or keywords to catch these products. Review the unclassified products to identify missing categories.
